sentences.english: There are no obvious relationship between weakening of the glottal stop and the length of the tone.

sentences.english: Don't talk for too long or ramble. Two minutes is the absolute max.

sentences.english: The second chapter refers to studies on mono-syllable tone from the two perspectives of pitch and duration.

sentences.english: The series will consist of eight hour-long episodes, and is set to premiere in the fall.

definition: time interval/work shift/time slot/the twelve two-hour divisions of the day
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
to clear customs/(gaming) to finish (a game, a level, a stage, etc)
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
time-consuming/to take a period of (x amount of time)
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
